docs.lead_paragraph: In its 1964 annual report, the National Multiple Sclerosis Society said: "While no decisive breakthrough was achieved or appeared to be imminent, there were several imaginative and significant developments whose ultimate conclusions could be most rewarding."

headline.main: Multiple Sclerosis; ' Significant Developments' Reported -- Remissions Make Research Difficult
